wms_article.title: LG H&H’s THE WHOO targets Vietnam’s cosmetics market

wms_article_body.body: THE WHOO, a luxury cosmetics brand under South Korea’s LG H&H Co., has partnered with Vietnamese beauty influencer Hannah Olala for marketing collaboration to strengthen its presence in the Vietnam, the company announced on Friday. Hannah Olala, whose real name is Hannah Nguyen, has 1.4 million followers on TikTok and around 1.37 million followers on Facebook. LG H&H invited her to Korea from July 20 to 24 for a THE WHOO Brand Tour. During her visit, the influencer toured the company’s headquarters in central Seoul, THE WHOO Royal Beauty Research Center in Magok, western Seoul, and the store of the modern hanbok brand Danha, which collaborated on a product with THE WHOO’s Bichup first care essence. “THE WHOO and its products have been well received in Vietnam, resulting in a 57 percent increase in sales in the first half of this year compared to the same period last year,” said an official from the brand. “We will continue to expand our customer engagement through active marketing efforts both online and offline.”
